DataElement.preferredName: Tumor Post Gadolinium Delayed Image Enhancement Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response for questions to capture tumor enhancement on delayed imaging after the administration of Gadolinium.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tumor Post Gadolinium Delayed Image Enhancement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: (NEE-o-PLAY-zha) Abnormal and uncontrolled cell growth._Post; occuring after._An element with atomic symbol Gd, atomic number 64, and atomic weight 157.25._Delay; time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time._Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic._To improve the quality of something; make better or more attractive.

Concepts.definition: A benign or malignant tissue growth resulting from uncontrolled cell proliferation. Benign neoplastic cells resemble normal cells without exhibiting significant cytologic atypia, while malignant cells exhibit overt signs such as dysplastic features, atypical mitotic figures, necrosis, nuclear pleomorphism, and anaplasia. Representative examples of benign neoplasms include papillomas, cystadenomas, and lipomas; malignant neoplasms include carcinomas, sarcomas, lymphomas, and leukemias.

Property.preferredDefinition: Post; occuring after.:An element with atomic symbol Gd, atomic number 64, and atomic weight 157.25.:Delay; time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time.:Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.:To improve the quality of something; make better or more attractive.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
An element with atomic symbol Gd, atomic number 64, and atomic weight 157.25.
Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.
Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.
To improve the quality of something; make better or more attractive.
